name: TeleBlastura
description:
Get those trash and dumpster-fire televisions before they get you.

Forward: W or Up
Back: S or Down
Left: A or Left
Right D or Right

Toggle turning/looking:Left Shift Key or Left Mouse Button
Fire:Right Shift key
Exit App: Escape key

On Linux systems (tested on Ubuntu MATE 20.04), the Synaptic touchpad driver's "Disable touchpad while typing" option may prevent turning while moving. Two workarounds are:
-Uncheck the option under "Mouse and Touchpad"
-Connect an external mouse.

The Windows 10 version works, but I have yet to test the macOS version. If some brave Mac user would give it a shot, I'd appreciate feedback.

I came up with the idea upon seeing intrepid tech journalists Jason Howell, Georgia Dow, and Sam Machkovech play "The Rise of Jumbotron" on TWiT.tv . Howell observed the bat-bot looked like a flying TV set.
